scripts.build: tsup && rm -rf ./dist/components && cp -r ../components  ./dist/components && node dist/index.js buildSchema
scripts.init: if [ -d dist ]; then node dist/index.js init; else npm run build && node dist/index.js; fi
scripts.copy: if [ -d dist ]; then node dist/index.js copy; else npm run build && node dist/index.js; fi
